title: Bookshelf: Open Source eBook Management Software
description:
Bookshelf is an eBook management software that users can use to easily manage and access eBooks across multiple devices.  
The project's main part is _bookshelf-server_, a web application written in PHP. _bookshelf-server_ offers both a backend which stores the book metadata and a frontend which the user can access through their browser. In addition, it has an external API to allow the use of independent clients.  
A copy of this book is available at [Amazon](https://www.amazon.de/Bookshelf-eBook-Management/dp/1514637677).
